item.title: Bhandardara - Mumbai Overview
item.description: A VILLAGE IS A HIVE OF GLASS, WHERE NOTHING UNOBSERVED CAN PASS. ~ CHARLES SPURGEON Just the end of 2014 after graduating from college, I started my first job in Mumbai. While I was just a learner of professionalism at workplace, I met many like minded acquaintances and became friends in no time. After all the amazing trainings were done, the 2 month program had also created amazing friendships. So with all these friends, we planned a day trip to Bhandardhara which was a village just 185km from Mumbai.
